title: Location Scouting and Permitting
description: A production needs to find and secure permits for a public location (e.g., a city park) for a film shoot.

tasks.description: Search a location database for city parks that match the script's description.
Check the permitting requirements and fees for the selected park with the city's film office.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent retrieves the permit application form and a list of required documents.

tasks.description: Submit the completed film permit application.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully submits the application and all required documentation.
